name: Apple
meaning: A round fruit with red or green skin.

name: Book
meaning: A set of written or printed pages bound together.

name: Chair
meaning: A piece of furniture for sitting.

name: Dog
meaning: A domesticated animal often kept as a pet.

name: Eat
meaning: To consume food.

name: Friend
meaning: A person you like and trust.

name: Go
meaning: To move from one place to another.

name: House
meaning: A building for people to live in.

name: Ice
meaning: Frozen water.

name: Juice
meaning: A drink made from fruit.

name: Key
meaning: A small metal object used to open locks.

name: Lamp
meaning: A device that gives light.

name: Milk
meaning: A white liquid from cows used as a drink or food ingredient.

name: Notebook
meaning: A book of blank pages for writing in.

name: Orange
meaning: A round orange-colored fruit.

name: Pen
meaning: A tool used for writing with ink.

name: Quiet
meaning: Not making much noise.

name: Run
meaning: To move fast on foot.

name: Sun
meaning: The star that lights and heats the Earth.

name: Table
meaning: A piece of furniture with a flat top and legs.

name: Umbrella
meaning: A device used to protect from rain.

name: Vegetable
meaning: A plant used as food.

name: Water
meaning: A clear liquid essential for life.

name: Xylophone
meaning: A musical instrument with wooden bars.

name: Yogurt
meaning: A creamy food made from milk.

name: Zoo
meaning: A place where animals are kept for public viewing.

name: Ball
meaning: A round object used in games and sports.

name: Car
meaning: A vehicle with four wheels used for transport.

name: Door
meaning: A movable barrier used to open and close an entrance.

name: Ear
meaning: The organ of hearing.

name: Fan
meaning: A device for creating a current of air.

name: Gift
meaning: Something given to another person.

name: Hat
meaning: A covering for the head.

name: Ink
meaning: A colored fluid used for writing or printing.

name: Jeans
meaning: Pants made of denim fabric.

name: Kite
meaning: A light frame covered with cloth flown in the wind.

name: Leaf
meaning: The flat part of a plant or tree.

name: Map
meaning: A visual representation of an area.

name: Nose
meaning: The part of the face used for smelling and breathing.

name: Oven
meaning: A kitchen appliance used for baking or roasting.

name: Phone
meaning: A device used to talk to people at a distance.

name: Queen
meaning: A female ruler or the wife of a king.

name: Road
meaning: A path for vehicles to travel on.

name: Shoe
meaning: Footwear worn to protect the feet.

name: Train
meaning: A series of connected vehicles running on tracks.

name: Van
meaning: A type of vehicle used for transporting goods or people.

name: Window
meaning: An opening in a wall to let in light and air.

name: Box
meaning: A container with flat sides and a lid.

name: Cup
meaning: A small bowl-shaped container for drinks.

name: Dish
meaning: A container used to serve food.

name: Egg
meaning: An oval object laid by birds, especially chickens.

name: Fork
meaning: A tool used for eating with prongs.

name: Glove
meaning: A covering for the hand.

name: Hill
meaning: A naturally raised area of land.

name: Island
meaning: A piece of land surrounded by water.

name: Jug
meaning: A container for liquids with a handle and spout.

name: Knife
meaning: A tool used for cutting.

name: Lamp
meaning: A device that produces light.

name: Moon
meaning: The natural satellite of the Earth.

name: Net
meaning: A piece of mesh used for catching or holding things.

name: Pan
meaning: A metal container used for cooking.

name: Quilt
meaning: A warm bed covering made of padding and fabric.

name: Ring
meaning: A small circular band, typically worn on the finger.

name: Star
meaning: A glowing ball of gas in the sky.

name: Tap
meaning: A device for controlling the flow of liquid.

name: Urn
meaning: A container for holding ashes or liquids.

name: Vest
meaning: A sleeveless garment worn on the upper body.

name: Watch
meaning: A small timepiece worn on the wrist.

name: Ax
meaning: A tool used for chopping wood.

name: Brush
meaning: A tool with bristles used for cleaning or painting.

name: Cloud
meaning: A mass of water vapor in the sky.

name: Drum
meaning: A musical instrument played by beating.

name: Engine
meaning: A machine that converts energy into movement.

name: Fence
meaning: A structure that encloses an area.

name: Goat
meaning: A domesticated animal with horns and a beard.

name: Hill
meaning: A naturally elevated area of land.

name: Igloo
meaning: A dome-shaped house made of snow.

name: Jam
meaning: A sweet spread made from fruit and sugar.

name: King
meaning: A male ruler of a country or territory.

name: Log
meaning: A thick piece of cut wood.

name: Mat
meaning: A piece of material placed on a floor or other flat surface.

name: Nail
meaning: A small metal spike used to join things together.

name: Oil
meaning: A thick liquid used for cooking or as fuel.

name: Pig
meaning: A farm animal kept for its meat.

name: Quiz
meaning: A test of knowledge.

name: Rat
meaning: A small rodent similar to a mouse.

name: Sock
meaning: A piece of clothing worn on the foot.

name: Toy
meaning: An object for children to play with.

name: Uniform
meaning: A special set of clothes worn by members of the same group.

name: Vase
meaning: A container used to hold flowers.

name: Web
meaning: A structure of fine threads made by a spider.

name: Yawn
meaning: To open the mouth wide and take a deep breath when tired or bored.

name: Zip
meaning: A fastening device with interlocking teeth.
